short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change any website, apply community styles or create your own.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open Stylur on any website to apply freely available community created styles in a single click; or create and submit your own using the power of CSS!

Create or apply styles such as:

⚫ New themes to keep things fresh
⚫ Styles to help with accessibility
⚫ Hide or change annoying elements
⚫ Highlight important elements 

Check out what the growing community has come up with on your favourite website.


Please read the Stylur.net Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions:
https://stylur.net/privacy
https://stylur.net/terms
By installing this extension, you agree to these terms.
